issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] LogicalPlanBuilder.limit() should take a literal argument
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8261](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8261). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
LogicalPlanBuilder.limit() should take a literal argument rather than requiring an expression representing a literal value, or maybe we have two versions of this method.
